title: Renens VD railway station
text:
Renens VD railway station is a <a href="rail%20transport">railway</a> and <a href="rapid%20transit">metro</a> station in <a href="Renens">Renens</a>, <a href="Vaud">Vaud</a>, <a href="Switzerland">Switzerland</a>, west of the city of <a href="Lausanne">Lausanne</a>. It is served by trains of the <a href="Swiss%20Federal%20Railways">Swiss Federal Railways</a> (SBB) on the <a href="Lausanne%E2%80%93Geneva%20railway">Lausanne–Geneva railway</a> and the <a href="Lausanne%20Metro%23Line%20M1">M1 metro line</a> in <a href="Lausanne">Lausanne</a> (also called TSOL). It is one of the termini of the <a href="Lausanne%20Metro">Lausanne Metro</a> system.
